Methods in edu.bath.transitivityutils with parameters of type Navigator
static
<E> Set<E>
Navigators.closure(Navigator<E> navigator, E object)
          Returns the transitive closure of an object (which always includes the object itself), which is the set of objects that are (by any number of steps) reachable from the specified object, using the supplied navigator.
static
<E> Set<E>
Navigators.closureOfMany(Navigator<E> navigator, Iterable<? extends E> objects)
          Returns the unon of the transitive closures of some objects (which always includes the objects themselves), which is the set of objects that are (by any number of steps) reachable from any of the specified objects, using the supplied navigator.
static

Relations.merge(TransitiveRelation<? super E> relation, Navigator<E> navigator)
          Merges into a TransitiveRelation all particular relationships found in the specified navigator.

          Merges into a TransitiveRelation all particular relationships found in the specified acyclic navigator.
